about_the_game:
Give your modern game some electronic beats with A Long Goodbye! Ayato Sound Create is back with another music pack, this time with 19 BGMs to fill your maps with interesting music and help the emotions in your cutscenes really sink in. Electronic beeps and stings play alongside string and percussion instruments to create tracks that can perfectly fit modern and sci-fi games, or grab a few of these tunes to add a new element to your fantasy game’s magical realm.

Each track comes in M4a, MP3, and Ogg files formats so you can drop them right into your current project and keep on game making without any worries. Pick up A Long Goodbye today and add notes of melancholy to your somber scenes and up the intensity during a face-off with a longtime foe!

Contents:

* 19 songs royalty free
* m4a, ogg, mp3 file formats included
